name: srp-claude-code-marketplace
description: Internal SRP Claude Code plugins and MCP servers - monorepo structure

plugins.name: srp-allstaff
plugins.description: SRP全员插件 - 飞书集成工具（云文档、消息与群组）

plugins.name: srp-developer
plugins.description: SRP开发者插件 - 扩展allstaff功能，增加GitHub集成、GCP只读访问等开发工具

plugins.name: srp-devops
plugins.description: SRP运维插件 - 扩展allstaff功能，增加Kubernetes管理、云资源管理等运维工具

plugins.name: example-hello-world
plugins.description: Example plugin demonstrating basic Claude Code skill structure

plugins.name: feishu-notify
plugins.description: Feishu notification plugin for Claude Code - sends notifications on permission requests and task completion
